fields.Name: web3.storage
fields.Short description: web3.storage is a suite of APIs and services that make it easy for developers and other users to interact with their data layer directly.
fields.Long description: web3.storage is a suite of APIs and services that make it easy for developers and other users to interact with data in a way that is not tied to where the data is actually physically stored. With web3.storage, you get all the benefits of decentralized storage and other cutting-edge protocols with the frictionless experience you expect in a modern dev workflow.

fields.Name: Exorde Labs
fields.Short description: First protocol to collect and extract sentiment from social networks in real-time.
fields.Long description: Exorde is a protocol aimed at analyzing the propagation of information across the Web. Leveraging a decentralized community, Exorde reaches out into Web2 to create a dynamic map of content that is being created and relayed on the Web in real time. Exorde's unique reach makes it so it can collect information all over the world, regardless of language barriers, proxies, separate internet etc.

fields.Name: Fission
fields.Short description: Building the data, auth & compute primitives that enable true local-first edge applications.
fields.Long description: Fission is building the data, auth & compute primitives that enable local-first edge applications. They have an IPFS-based in browser edge app stack of DID-based identity and encrypted file storage, and have developed the UCAN spec for decentralized auth and WNFS.
fields.Notes INTERNAL: No Updates needed. May be a way to present their social channels here in a more user friendly way.

fields.Name: Slate
fields.Short description: A bookmarking and search tool.
fields.Long description: Slate is a new file-sharing network that makes it possible for people to collect, organize, and link files together.

fields.Name: Forte Group
fields.Short description: Forte Group is a full-spectrum custom software delivery partner for enterprises looking to accelerate their business and evolve their engineering practices.
fields.Long description: Forte Group is a full-spectrum custom software delivery partner for enterprises looking to accelerate their business and evolve their engineering practices. Forte Group works with software engineering departments, business leaders, and technology companies to consistently achieve valuable business outcomes.

fields.Name: Astrofitters
fields.Short description:
Astrofitters helps teams of all sizes design impactful branded merchandise that people want to keep.

Global Events. Team Merch. Gifts & More
fields.Long description:
Astrofitters helps teams of all sizes design impactful branded merchandise that people want to keep.

Global Events. Team Merch. Gifts & More

fields.Name: Bunkyr
fields.Short description: Zero-Knowledge security without seed phrases or backup codes.
fields.Long description: Bunkyr enables companies to protect their users’ data with a simple, hardware-secured API. When a user forgets their password or loses their private key, services using Bunkyr can provide them a familiar, robust recovery method to restore access to crypto assets or other encrypted data. With Zero-Knowledge architecture, users won’t even know Bunkyr exists, while their data stays protected against both breaches and lost passwords.

fields.Name: Notifi Network
fields.Short description: Building the leading cross-chain messaging and embedded notifications infrastructure for Web3.
fields.Long description: Notifi is a one-stop shop to provide a communication-as-a-service platform for Web3 users who live in Web2. We provide specific solutions to enable projects to onboard with ease as well as equip users with better tools to manage their Web3 footprint.

fields.Name: MuckRock
fields.Short description: MuckRock is a non-profit, collaborative news site that brings together journalists, researchers, activists, and regular citizens to request, analyze, and share government documents, making politics more transparent and democracies more informed.
fields.Long description:
MuckRock is a non-profit, collaborative news site that brings together journalists, researchers, activists, and regular citizens to request, analyze, and share government documents, making politics more transparent and democracies more informed.

The site provides a repository of hundreds of thousands of pages of original government materials, information on how to file requests, and tools to make the requesting process easier. In addition, MuckRock staff and outside contributors are using these primary source documents received through the site to create original investigative reporting and analysis.

MuckRock's unique form of investigative and accountability journalism has been recognized by the Sunlight Foundation, The Freedom of the Press Foundation, and hundreds of local and national news outlets for its groundbreaking work in areas such as government spending, surveillance, and public safety.

fields.Name: Finnt
fields.Short description: Building more accessible financial services with the power of decentralized finance.
fields.Long description: Finnt is building more accessible financial services with the power of Decentralized Finance. They bring services and tools that can benefit the masses, and especially the most disadvantaged communities.

fields.Name: Speculative Technologies
fields.Short description: A hybrid organization focused on coordinated technology research.
fields.Long description: Speculative Technologies is riffing on the DARPA model to design, fund, and coordinate ambitious research programs that shift the impossible to the inevitable.

fields.Name: Magna
fields.Short description: Token distribution on autopilot: easily airdrop or stream tokens on custom unlock schedules.
fields.Long description: Magna helps you stay compliant, track your transactions, and automate your tax withholdings to create the perfect token operations system. We enable you to distribute tokens to investors and employees securely on autopilot with Magna’s audited smart contracts. Our pre-launch management allows you to manage your legal agreements (SAFTs, token warrants, token grants) and communicate the value of your future token.

fields.Name: Subconscious, Inc
fields.Short description: Subconscious is building a worldwide decentralized shared brain.
fields.Long description: Subconscious is building a worldwide decentralized shared brain. Think together across a distributed protocol. Follow friends and friendly AI agents. Every follow is a new synapse in your second brain.

fields.Name: Anaconda
fields.Short description: Anaconda is the world’s most popular and trusted Python/R platform for data science, machine learning, and AI.
fields.Long description: Anaconda is the world’s most popular data science platform and the foundation of modern machine learning. They pioneered the use of Python for data science, champion its vibrant community, and continue to steward open-source projects that make tomorrow’s innovations possible. Anaconda's enterprise-grade solutions enable corporate, research, and academic institutions around the world to harness the power of open source for competitive advantage, groundbreaking research, and a better world.

fields.Long description: Ingonyama builds semi-conductors to accelerate zksnarks.

fields.Name: Kotal

fields.Long description: Democratize the internet. Help us by recording attention on your content to add it to our knowledge archive.

fields.Name: LongHash Ventures
fields.Short description: A Web3 venture fund and accelerator, collaborating with founders since 2018
fields.Long description: LongHash Ventures is a Web3 venture fund and accelerator, actively collaborating with founders since 2018.   In January 2021, they launched a DeFi-focused fund and invested in projects such as Balancer, Acala Network, Instadapp, and Zapper. They collaborated with their founders to develop their tokenomics, governance, and communities through Asia DeFi Network.   With the LongHashX Accelerator, they have partnered with Polkadot and Filecoin to build more than 40 global Web 3 projects which have raised more than $100m in the past 3 years.

fields.Name: Lit Protocol
fields.Short description: A decentralized access control infrastructure designed to bring more utility to the web.
fields.Long description: Lit Protocol is a a decentralized access control infrastructure designed to bring more utility to the web. Companies, creators, and DAOs use it to grant access to content, software, and data using tokens, NFTs, and blockchain identity as keys.

fields.Name: LabDAO

fields.Long description: LabDAO is a community of scientists and engineers coming together to share open tools for life science research. The community's mission is to accelerate progress in the life sciences by making both computational and wet-lab tools accessible to all its members.

fields.Name: Magmo
fields.Short description: Magmo is working to make state channels more accessible to the Ethereum developer community.
fields.Long description: Magmo is a team of researchers working on state channels, the scaling solution that enables high frequency state exchanges for the decentralized web.

fields.Name: CyberConnect
fields.Short description: A decentralized social graph protocol built with IPFS and Ceramic.
fields.Long description: CyberConnect is a decentralized social graph protocol built with IPFS and Ceramic. It creates a data standard, data storage infrastructure, and recommendation indexing system for social connections, providing a universal data layer for the next generation of dApps - GameFi, NFTs, DAOs - to adopt and create their own context-specific social functions.

fields.Name: blocz
fields.Short description: blocz is Decentralising the Edge providing compute, storage, GPU and networking infrastructure for Web3/Web2.
fields.Long description:
blocz is Decentralising the Edge by providing compute, storage, GPU's and networking infrastructure for the development of Web3/Web2 all managed via our portal.

Our Edge locations provide greater proximity to end-user where the data is not only consumed but also created.

Ultra-Low networking provides greater experience for gaming at the Edge, the open-Metaverse, XR/AR/VR applications as well as providing a real-time and near real-time AI support.

fields.Name: IOSG Ventures

fields.Name: Metaverse Summit

fields.Name: Samouraï World

fields.Name: Ecko

fields.Long description: Ecko empowers and connects music creators worldwide through Web3 technology.

fields.Name: Network Growth

fields.Long description: Polygon believes in Web3 for all. Polygon is a decentralised Ethereum scaling platform that enables developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps with low transaction fees without ever sacrificing on security.

fields.Name: LZero
fields.Short description: LZero is the one-stop shop for all your group travel needs, services only made possible with web3!

fields.Name: Anytype
fields.Short description: Private, open-source, self-hosted tool for knowledge & productivity management.
fields.Long description:
Anytype is a community-owned operating system that breaks
down barriers between applications, returning
privacy and data ownership to users.

fields.Name: Agoric
fields.Short description: A Proof-of-Stake chain utilizing secure JavaScript smart contracts to build and deploy DeFi.
fields.Long description: Agoric is an open-source development company launching an interoperable Proof-of-Stake chain and economy. Their JavaScript-native smart contract platform offers developers a safe, reusable library of DeFi components to rapidly build and deploy on-chain.

fields.Name: Big Data Exchange
fields.Short description: BigDataExchange (BDE) is an auction-style marketplace dedicated to facilitate storage of important public data on the decentralized web, powered by IPFS and Filecoin.
fields.Long description:
BigDataExchange (BDE) is an auction-style marketplace dedicated to facilitate storage of important public data on the decentralized web, powered by IPFS and Filecoin. It aims to create:
An innovative storage platform to incentivize more people to source, migrate, and store valuable public data on Filecoin
A transparent marketplace to connect Fil+ clients and storage providers, adding visibility to the SP selection process and preventing potential self-dealing activities
An index of public data stored on Filecoin, which paves the way to a vibrant retrieval and service market for Fil+ deals

fields.Name: Polywrap
fields.Short description: Open-source toolchain for building WebAssembly-based SDKs that are composable and secure.
fields.Long description: Polywrap is a fully distributed, open-source organization building tools to solve the problem of developing and delivering software to any device. The heart of Polywrap’s technology is a toolchain that enables the creation of WebAssembly-powered SDKs. Any applications created using these SDKs will be secure, can run on any deployment platform across multiple programming languages, and accessible on-demand. This allows developers to combine and extend application functionality in new and exciting ways.

fields.Name: Bust Out
fields.Short description: Bust Out designs and builds website, mobile apps, and digital experiences.
fields.Long description: In business since 2005, Bust Out is an elite team of talented experts, capable of helping our customers with content strategy, creative, app design, web development, deployment, technical support and more.

fields.Name: Tamago Labs
fields.Short description: Building NFT Legos for next-generation content creation
fields.Long description: Tamago Labs is an NFT development lab in Japan focused on building secure, composable NFT infrastructure, tooling and use case development. Currently building promptsea.io, a platform for next-generation literature/art works in NFT using MTCP scheme to protect the exclusive content being shared to token holders.

fields.Name: Braneframe
fields.Short description: A Web3 company building peer-to-peer privacy-preserving applications built on open-source protocols.
fields.Long description: Braneframe is a Web3 company building peer-to-peer privacy-preserving applications built on open-source protocols. It is a leading project in the DXOS (Decentralized Operating System) ecosystem, whose participants are working toward an alternative to the tech giant-dominated public cloud.

fields.Name: Rodeo Money, Inc.
fields.Short description: Crypto cashback as a service.
fields.Long description: We provide APIs to crypto companies that want to increase customer activation and loyalty through cashback rewards. Users can earn crypto on their everyday purchases.

fields.Name: SkillWallet - Aut Labs
fields.Short description: SkillWallets are NFT IDs that unlock the power of Web3 Communities.
fields.Long description: SkillWallet is a self-sovereign, portable ID based on skills & contributions that unlock native, role-based governance for Web3 communities. Users can prove their skills & reputation, while DAOs can track real human interactions directly on-chain, to evaluate the health and growth of the community.

fields.Name: Molecule

fields.Long description: Molecule is a decentralized biotech protocol, building a web3 marketplace for research-related IP. Their platform and scalable framework for biotech DAOs connects academics and biotech companies with quick and easy funding, while enabling patient, researcher, and investor communities to directly govern and own research-related IP.

fields.Name: PowerLoom
fields.Short description: Scaling trust in DeFi as the first verification primitive.
fields.Long description: PowerLoom aggregates on-chain and off-chain data to generate snapshots with cryptographic proofs in a decentralized manner. It aims to build trust and offer meaningful insights on demand through an ecosystem of peers and stakeholders that are incentivized to participate in the protocol.

fields.Name: European Agency for the Space Programme
fields.Short description: The EU Agency for the Space Programme (EUSPA) provides safe and performant space services, enabling synergies, EU innovation, sustainability, and security.
fields.Long description: The EU Agency for the Space Programme (EUSPA) provides safe and performant space services, enabling synergies, EU innovation, sustainability, and security.  To achieve this, EUSPA manages the Galileo and EGNOS programmes, develops markets for Copernicus services and data, coordinates user-related aspects of the GOVSATCOM programme, and carries out work in various areas targeted at Security, Research and Development and increasing space’s contribution to the EU Market. The Agency is also responsible for the security accreditation of all the components of the EU Space Programme.   EUSPA, staffed with skilled professionals bringing relevant experience from the public and private sectors, is unique in contributing to one of the most important and ambitious projects ever undertaken by the EU. We are committed to implementing the EU Space Programme and turning the EU space ambitions into a reality.

fields.Name: Hedgey Finance

fields.Long description: Hedgey Protocol is the rails for building options markets on DeFi with open source code, SDKs and developer documentation. They enable DAOs to generate stable coins, diversify treasuries, and structure native token sales.

fields.Notes INTERNAL: NO LD / Need to connect with Sumit

fields.Name: Compute over Data
fields.Short description: COD aims to enrich the Filecoin ecosystem by providing a compute over data framework that integrates seamlessly with core functionality.
fields.Long description: The Compute Over Data (COD) working group aims to enrich the Filecoin ecosystem by providing a compute over data framework that integrates seamlessly with core functionality and can be a platform for future developers in any ecosystem. It is made up of a large community of member projects who want to create a space to collaborate on decentralized Compute Over Data platforms.

fields.Name: Autonomy Network
fields.Short description: An automation protocol for on-chain features like limits, stops, and recurring payments.
fields.Long description:
The Autonomy Network is a decentralized automation solution powering the Web3 with on-chain conditional execution.

Autonomy's genuine utility token enables users to pay discounted network fees, defer execution payments and is required to execute transactions.

fields.Name: Joyn
fields.Short description: Building a platform for creators to find each other, collaborate, and share rewards
fields.Long description: Joyn is building a platform for creators to find each other, collaborate, and share rewards. They are continuing to add tools to help users contribute and monetize their work.

fields.Name: StorSwift
fields.Short description: StorSwift is a professional storage system provider. They focus on storage, devops, data analytics, security, and so on.
fields.Long description: StorSwift is a Web3 storage and enterprise private cloud storage infrastructure technology and service provider. The company’s core team comes from a professional storage company headquartered in Silicon Valley, with over a decade of management, R&D and marketing experience in related industries.

fields.Name: Enlightra
fields.Short description:
Develops extreme-bandwidth data transmission
enabled by light.
fields.Long description: Enlightra develops multichannel lasers for optical data transmission. Their technology can replace up to hundreds of high-quality lasers to access extremely high data rates in a power-efficient and low-cost manner. They provide technology for multiple US and EU-funded research projects together worth >$25M, and are backed by Y Combinator.

fields.Name: Starboard Ventures
fields.Short description: Empowering Web3 Data Economies with Network Analytics & Product Incubation.
fields.Long description: With the growing adoption of Web3 data services such as blockchain, smart contracts, NFT, and decentralized data storage and retrieval, economic networks around Web3 data and data services are emerging quickly.  However, the rapid development of such economic networks often leads to increasing complexities, making it difficult for network participants and stakeholders to understand the networks and make well-informed decisions.  Starboard aims to close the above mentioned gaps and empower the success of Web3 data economies through research, insights, and product incubation. Starboard is a dedicated contributor to the Filecoin Network, which is the largest Web3 data economy in the world.

fields.Name: Gitcoin
fields.Short description: Gitcoin is the community of builders, creators, and protocols at the center of open web ecosystems.
fields.Long description: Gitcoin is the community of builders, creators, and protocols at the center of open web ecosystems. We are creating community and infrastructure for Web 3 — a diverse range of tools, technologies, and networks that enable people to work for the open internet. We want to develop digital public goods, create financial freedom, and define the future of the open web.

fields.Name: Spritely Institute
fields.Short description: Building a gatekeeper-free, decentralized system of social media.
fields.Long description: Spritely is a nonprofit corporation whose mission is “social media done right”. They want to put people in control of their own identity and build the technology that will enable a shift to collaborative and intentional security models prioritizing active consent. They are building a new architecture for the internet: removing the necessity of client-server architecture, replacing it with a participatory peer-centric model.

fields.Name: FogMeta

 - Filecoin-IPFS Data Rebuilder website: http://rebuilder.fogmeta.com
 - Swan Client: https://github.com/FogMeta/go-swan-client
 - Swan Provider: https://github.com/FogMeta/go-swan-provider
 - Chainsnap: https://github.com/FogMeta/chainsnap

fields.Short description: Coordinate open-source engineering efforts working on MIT-licensed chain-agnostic improvement proposals and other ways of making decentralized ecosystems interoperable.
fields.Long description: "Decentralized systems" includes blockchains but also DPKI and other open-world models for data and/or infrastructure.

fields.Name: Puma Browser
fields.Short description: A mobile browser and wallet for the Web3 ecosystem that is private by design.
fields.Long description:
Puma is a mobile browser and wallet for the Web3 ecosystem that is private by design. They enable payments for creators, app & game developers via Coil and ILP protocol and native IPFS, HNS & ENS support.
.

fields.Name: Bacalhau
fields.Short description: Bacalhau seeks to address deep rooted gaps in managing big data by giving developers low cost, decentralized tools that unlock a new collaborative ecosystem.
fields.Long description: Bacalhau seeks to address deep rooted gaps in managing big data by giving developers low cost, decentralized tools that unlock a new collaborative ecosystem. fields.Long description: Cross-chain messaging protocol for cross-chain data, identity & asset management, as well as a platform to search & retrieve NFT metadata & insights across multiple blockchains.

fields.Name: Safe

fields.Long description: Safe, formerly Gnosis Safe, is a smart contract wallet running on a number of blockchains that requires a minimum number of people to approve a transaction before it can occur (M-of-N).

fields.Name: Resolutio

fields.Long description: Resolutio is an NFT Community driven platform to strengthen the NFT ecosystem. We are a community of artists, art lovers, developers & ors., collaborating to protect artists and restore trust in NFTs, starting with spreading awareness on NFT rights + fighting NFT theft.

fields.Name: Yatima

fields.Long description: Yatima is a Filecoin layer-2 platform which uses formal verification and zero-knowledge proofs to radically improve the safety and scalability of smart contracts and other deterministic computations.

fields.Name: Celestia Labs

fields.Long description: Celestia Labs is a modular consensus and data network, built to enable anyone to easily deploy their own blockchain with minimal overhead.

fields.Name: StarkWare Industries Ltd.
fields.Short description: STARK-Based Scaling Solutions
fields.Long description: StarkWare solves the inherent problems of blockchains – scalability and privacy.

fields.Name: 0xEssential
fields.Short description: Open-source NFT standards for the metaverse and permissionless metaverse gaming platforms for NFTs.
fields.Long description: 0xEssential enables true digital asset ownership through portability. Their developer tools and platforms help users create NFTs with utility throughout the open metaverse.

fields.Name: Unstoppable Systems
fields.Short description: Making crypto payments simple and building decentralized websites with .crypto and new NFT domains.
fields.Long description: Unstoppable Domains is on a mission to return the power of the internet to people. To accomplish this, they are creating NFT domains that put you back in control of your data.

fields.Name: Little Bear Labs

fields.Long description: Little Bear Labs works with technical and non-technical leaders to create tailor-made engineering solutions. fields.Short description: The "Gate ecosystem" consists of Wallet.io, HipoDeFi and Gatechain, all of which were created to provide users with a secure, simple and fair trading platform as well as the ability to safeguard assets and trading information.
fields.Long description: The "Gate ecosystem" consists of Wallet.io, HipoDeFi and Gatechain, all of which were created to provide users with a secure, simple and fair trading platform as well as the ability to safeguard assets and trading information. Currently, they provide trade, investment, and digital wallet services for more than 300 digital assets.

fields.Name: Crcle
fields.Short description: A branding and design collective for web3.
fields.Long description: The Protocol Labs visual design team is now Crcle. They’ve broadened their focus to include design for the web3 community, while they continue to generate great design for PL.

fields.Name: Nebula Blockchain Frontier Solutions Inc.
fields.Short description: As one of North America's biggest W3b3 hosting companies, Nebula block data offers a one-stop-shop blockchain solution and Turn-key decentralized data center services.
fields.Long description: With years of ample development and operational experience in web3, Nebula Block provides customers with nodes set up within minutes, IPFS CDN services, node monitoring,  7*24 technical support, multi-lingual customer service, smart hand and remote hand services, and a global supply chain system with 4 data centres across 3 continents. By choosing our services， customers can effectively enjoy fast, professional and security services,  reduce maintenance costs, equipment investments, leased line costs, etc.

fields.Name: Taubyte
fields.Short description: Taubyte is an Open Source Web3/Edge Cloud Computing Platform
fields.Long description:
Taubyte has built the next generation open-source Cloud platform that is optimized for Edge Computing & peer-to-peer architectures and satisfies decentralized applications requirements.

Taubyte can be deployed in a few hours on hundreds of nodes, require low maintenance and ops (autonomous/self-healing) and offer an amazing developer experience (doc & video tutorials @ https://tau.how).

fields.Name: Filebase
fields.Short description: S3 Compatible Object Storage Powered by Web3
fields.Long description: Filebase is an object storage platform powered by decentralized networks. They unify multiple networks under a single S3-compatible API to make decentralized storage accessible and easy to use.

fields.Name: FVM
fields.Short description: FVM introduces EVM-compatible on-chain user programmability to the Filecoin Network.
fields.Long description: The FVM working group develops and delivers on the Filecoin Virtual Machine roadmap. Learn more at https://fvm.filecoin.io/

fields.Name: Manta Ray Labs
fields.Short description: The first privacy-preserving DeFi stack powered by zkSNARKs.
fields.Long description: Manta Network is a decentralized project that delivers plug-and-play privacy for the entire DeFi stack. Built as a layer-1 protocol, the project leverages zkSNARK to provide algorithmically private on-chain transactions.

fields.Name: Drand
fields.Short description: Drand provides verifiable, unpredictable, and bias resistant random values as a service.
fields.Long description:
Drand is a randmoness beacon that provides verifiable, unpredictable, and bias resistant random values as a service. The drand network is operated by the League of Entropy (LoE), a group of 14 independent member organizations that contribute to the production of randomness beacons.
Decentralized: drand is an open source software project ran by a diverse set of reputable organizations on the Internet wherein a threshold of them is needed to generate randomness, which ensure there is no central point of failure.
Publicly verifiable & unbiased: drand periodically delivers publicly verifiable and unbiased randomness. Any third party can fetch and verify the authenticity of the randomness and by that making sure it hasn't been tampered with.
Drand is a randmoness beacon that provides verifiable, unpredictable, and bias resistant random values as a service. he drand network is operated by the League of Entropy (LoE), a group of 14 independent member organizations that contribute to the production of randomness beacons.

fields.Name: PL EngRes
fields.Short description: The PL Engineering and Research (EngRes) Workgroup is formed by teams of core protocol developers, network researchers, and experienced contributors in the Protocol Labs Network.
fields.Long description: The PL Engineering and Research (EngRes) Workgroup is formed by teams of core protocol developers, network researchers, and experienced contributors in the Protocol Labs Network. The PL EngRes WG mission is to scale and unlock new opportunities for IPFS, Filecoin, libp2p + IPLD, drive breakthroughs in protocol utility & capability, and scale network-native research & development across the PL Network.

fields.Name: Paras

fields.Long description: Paras is a digital art card marketplace built on blockchain technology that offers true ownership and digital scarcity. Paras use NEAR cryptocurrency as the medium of exchange between creators and collectors to support cross border transactions.

fields.Name: Endless Jewellery
fields.Short description: Endless rings contain an NFC chip readable by any smartphone. No app required. This links to your "eternal" IPFS file.

fields.Name: MeMusic
fields.Short description: MeMusic is a blockchain-based platform designed to create, listen, and share music
fields.Long description:
Music for everyone, day, moment, color, and shape. 
Personalizing the web3 music experience for every user.

fields.Name: Clockwork Labs
fields.Short description: A game studio focused on building societal games like MMORPG and BitCraft.
fields.Long description: Clockwork Labs is a new venture backed game studio focused on building multiplayer “societal games” that are less focused on pure combat and instead encourage social interaction and cooperation between players. They aim to foster creative collaboration in their virtual worlds.

fields.Name: YOMI
fields.Short description:
Yomi is a laboratory of innovation and development that aims at bridging the gap between ideas and reality through top-notch tech solutions.

The team’s greatest desire is to contribute towards delivering Web 3.0 to the world, i.e. a fair decentralized internet in which users control their own data, identity, and destiny.
fields.Long description:
We are a young, heterogeneous, and dynamic team of passionate blockchain practitioners with a pragmatic approach to work based on continuous training. 

Smart contracts, Web3 integrations, DApps, NFTs, DeFi platforms, AIs are just a few of the services we offer. 

Transforming research, study and inventions into technology used by a wide audience is the North Star guiding the team every day.

We are actively building, together with Protocol Labs, the projects Onchain.storage, Retriev.org and Web3bounty.app.

fields.Name: Kosen Labs
fields.Short description: Bringing the benefits of advanced AI to the decentralised economy.

fields.Long description: Ancient Warriors builds Web3 infrastructure and organizes community events to onboard and empower black and brown people in the space.

fields.Name: Force Community
fields.Short description: Non-profit Web3 Community
fields.Long description: Force Community is a non-profit leading Web3 community. We do believe in the strength of blockchain, which can empower the next generation of the Internet. Here you can get the latest updates about the development of the Web3 ecosystem, and with our years of experience within the blockchain industry, we encourage and support people to build around Web3, the Next Big Thing!

fields.Name: Photure Inc
fields.Short description: Fastest and Easiest way to make an NFT straight from your smartphone camera.

fields.Long description: OmniLingo is a protocol and sample implementation for language-learning applications with a focus on decentralised and self-determined storage, user rights and privacy, and minority and under-represented languages.

fields.Name: Meson.Network
fields.Short description: Bandwidth trading platform built on Blockchain
fields.Long description: Meson Network is committed to creating an efficient bandwidth marketplace on Web3, using a blockchain protocol model to replace the traditional labor-based sales models, consolidating and monetizing idle bandwidth from long-tail users at a low cost.

fields.Name: Buildspace
fields.Short description: Helping users learn web3, ship projects, earn NFTs & access secret opportunities in crypto.
fields.Long description: Buildspace accelerates your builder journey into web3. Whether you're just starting out, a seasoned vet transitioning from web2, or thinking of building something cool, they have something for you. Join 60k+ incredible builders doing just that.

fields.Name: Bifrost
fields.Short description: Bifrost’s Mission is helping build, grow and provide guidance on running ipfs and ipfs-cluster at scale.
fields.Long description: Bifrost’s mission is helping build, grow and provide guidance on running ipfs and ipfs-cluster at scale with an emphasis on providing a reliable, scaleable and fast gateway service at ipfs.io. And as part of the NetOps working group, we help to grow adoption of the decentralized Internet by building software infrastructure for implementation of the Filecoin, IPFS, and protocols, and operating them as services that can be consumed in a secure, reliable, and scalable manner.

fields.Name: University of Wuppertal
fields.Short description: The Bergische Universität is a dynamic university with an interdisciplinary range of research and teaching.
fields.Long description: The Bergische Universität Wuppertal is a modern and young university in the heart of North Rhine-Westphalia. Studying in Wuppertal means: Exciting content, well-organized studies, excellent supervision by motivated professors and excellent career opportunities. A wide range of subjects offers numerous study opportunities that promptly absorb new requirements of the professional and working world. Among them are also subjects and subject combinations that are unique in Germany. The attractive study content is based on the latest results of innovative cutting-edge research and are often designed in an interdisciplinary manner. In the bachelor's degree program, a broad qualification is taught; the master's degree programs based on this offer - depending on your career aspiration - individual specialization opportunities. At the same time, we offer practice-oriented study phases in cooperation with external partners. Experience abroad can also be gained at an early stage via an active network of international partner universities.

fields.Name: Sentinel
fields.Short description: The Sentinel team’s mission is to provide software and data for monitoring and analysis of the Filecoin chain.
fields.Long description: The Infra Team at Protocol Labs runs critical infrastructure that helps power networks like IPFS, Filecoin, libp2p, Drand, and other related projects. This requires rigorous engineering across protocol and infrastructure design, through all phases of implementation. All of this happens in an environment defined by curiosity, passion, and a love for open source. We encourage each other to think big, run experiments, and support each other in a blame-free environment.

fields.Name: Eqty Lab
fields.Short description: In stealth, launching soon.
fields.Long description: In stealth, launching soon.

fields.Name: libp2p Stewards
fields.Short description: The libp2p Stewards working group  works to ensure that libp2p is a solid foundation for web3
fields.Long description:
libp2p is a modular network stack that allows applications to run independent of their location.. It is an open source project from the IPFS community. The libp2p Stewards working group  works to ensure that libp2p is a solid foundation for web3 to build on today and can keep up with the weight bearing of tomorrow.

Learn more at https://libp2p.io/

fields.Name: OKcontract
fields.Short description: OKcontract is a web3 marketing platform, that unlocks new distribution opportunities for web3 projects by providing the easiest way to embed any smart contract transaction into web2 - web3 widgets.
fields.Long description: OKcontract is building a new gen web3 marketing platform to bridge the gap between creators and publishers. We introduced a web3 widget standard to empower web3 projects and brands to effortlessly create widgets for smart contracts and embed transactions into any web2. Web3 widgets unlock new distribution opportunities and solve user acquisition, activation and engagement across multiple industries: NFTs, metaverses, gaming, DeFi, DAOs. Our team is focused on making user onboarding effortless and providing tools to measure web3 widget campaigns efforts.

fields.Name: DAO.xyz
fields.Short description: Communication app with flexibility and privacy.
fields.Long description:
DAO.xyz is creating a communications app where we rethink first principles of digital communication, whether that is 1-to-1, 1-to-many and many-to-many. This includes private messaging, social media, news, wikis etc.

Alongside this we're deploying these novel experiments on a decentralized backend that is ready to scale, where you can self-host, group-host or delegate-host with state-of-the-art E2E encryption.

The short-term roadmap is to create a better conversations-application, such as Signal/Telegram/Messenger. We see there being many low-hanging fruits there, both in the user-experience and in the privacy realm.

Thereafter we'll launch a knowledge-management interface where users can interact with structured data whether that data emerge from conversations with others, brainstorm sessions, meetings, digital reading history or data previously entered in another structure.

The long-term goal is to create a social knowledge graph where users can score each other and others claims on truthfulness, usefulness and agree on shared values. The goal is to lay the foundation for digital discussions to act as institutions.

fields.Name: Satellite.im
fields.Short description: P2P Chat, Voice & Video, stored on IPFS.
fields.Long description: P2P Chat, Voice & Video, stored on IPFS.  Satellite is to be secure down to its core.  It utilizes leading decentralization and encryption technology to provide a platform to build extensible apps you can tailor with custom mods and extensions to make them your own. All of this, coupled with top to bottom encryption, makes your journey in the digital world a bit less scary and frustrating.

fields.Name: Skiff

fields.Long description: Skiff provides end-to-end encrypted email, collaboration, and file storage - powered by crypto wallets and IPFS.

fields.Long description:

Based in New York, they’re a team of scientists, designers, and technologists passionate about helping ideas grow. Their mission is to democratize science.

fields.Long description: The World's First Global, Carbon-Neutral, Cryptocurrency Mining Software.  Cudo innovates.   The Cudo mission: To provide easy access to disruptive technologies.  The Cudo vision: To create the largest global distributed platform for good.   Cudo is committed to creating ethical, collaborative and transparent cryptocurrency business ventures.  Cudo aims to make a big impact on the world by using our innovative technology for good as well as for profit.

fields.Name: Lava Network
fields.Short description: Decentralized RPC network where providers are accountable for fast, reliable, accurate service.
fields.Long description: Lava Network is a protocol which connects apps to a decentralized network of high quality blockchain API providers. Each provider is held accountable on-chain and rewarded for maintaining fast, reliable and accurate service. The connection is private, enabling anyone to fetch data without being associated with their queries. Lava is the community-led standard for accessing blockchain data, so developers can focus on building web3 apps with the best user experience.

fields.Name: Khoury College, Northeastern University
fields.Short description: Northeastern University's Khoury College of Computer Sciences delivers interdisciplinary academic programs and transformative research in the heart of Boston and beyond.
fields.Long description: Northeastern University's Khoury College of Computer Sciences delivers interdisciplinary academic programs and transformative research in the heart of Boston and beyond.   Founded in 1982, Khoury College was the nation’s first college dedicated to the field of computer science. Today, Khoury College is inspired by the information-driven world—and they strive to make it a better place. Their students engage in rigorous learning and real-world experiences. Their faculty shape minds, spark innovation, and inspire ideas. Their top scholars conduct research both in the core of computer science and at the intersection of computer science and other fields to solve everyday problems, from protecting privacy to improving health to designing the systems of tomorrow.  Khoury provides a strong technical foundation and an essential understanding of computing concepts while integrating computer, data, and information sciences across disciplines and industries. They offer a wide range of innovative, flexible programs from undergraduate to PhD, plus combined majors and Khoury Meaningful Minors, all built to fit individual pursuits.

fields.Name: Token
fields.Short description: Wearable biometric authentication - convenient and secure MFA multi-factor authentication.
fields.Long description: Introducing the strongest MFA with the greatest user convenience for the ultimate protection against ransomware and data breaches. The Token Ring gives you wearable biometric authentication, eliminating the friction and vulnerabilities of outdated authentication methods such as passwords and SMS passcodes while helping to prevent ransomware, data breaches, and data manipulation attacks.

fields.Name: CryptoEconLab
fields.Short description: CryptoEconLab is creating a global hub for cryptoeconomic research.
fields.Long description: Cryptoeconomics is an emerging field of incentive and mechanism design in cryptographically secured peer-to-peer networks. This multi-disciplinary endeavor is at the core of every Web3 project, pulling in knowledge from: computer science, network science, statistics, economics, and systems engineering. We are applying our learnings to grow and maintain the Filecoin ecosystem, where we are active drivers and participants.

fields.Name: Socialroots.io

fields.Long description: Soicalroots.io is a platform for decentralized or networked organizations to coordinate more effectively across groups. They help network organizations to reduce time spent managing organizational overhead, support community engagement, increase growth, create visibility and accountability of value exchange in network and de-silo work across organizations and sectors.

fields.Name: Probe Lab
fields.Short description: The Protocol Benchmarking & Optimization Team (ProbeLab) is on a mission to measure the performance of Web3.0 network protocols, benchmark protocols against target performance milestones and propose improvements to their core design principles.

fields.Name: Filecoin Retrieval Markets
fields.Short description: Filecoin Retrieval Markets working group facilitates a decentralized CDN for the Filecoin Network.
fields.Long description: The Filecoin Retrieval Market Working Group (RMWG) consists of teams tackling challenging problems in building a decentralized content delivery network. Projects range from ultra fast payments, to data transfer protocol enhancements to cryptoeconomic models for data retrieval.

fields.Name: CID Gravity

fields.Long description: CID Gravity provides software solutions for Filecoin mining operations, enabling storage deals and providing tailored pricing to clients in just a few clicks.

fields.Name: Ecosystem
fields.Short description: The Ecosystem WG is a collection of 6+ organizations that are dedicated to growing the Filecoin, IPFS, and libp2p ecosystems.
fields.Long description: The Ecosystem WG is a collection of 100+ people across 6+ organizations. It aims to seed the long-term growth of the decentralized web, by cultivating a wide variety of stakeholders, aligning them with the success of IPFS, Filecoin, and libp2p, and treating them like gold.

fields.Name: Status
fields.Short description: Status strives to be a secure communication tool that upholds human rights. Designed to enable the free flow of information, protect the right to private, secure conversations, and promote the sovereignty of individuals.

fields.Name: IPFS Stewards
fields.Short description: The IPFS Stewards working group is comprised of two teams, one focused on Kubo and another focused on GUI and Tools.
fields.Long description:
The IPFS Stewards working group is comprised of two sub teams, one focused on IPFS implementations and another focused on GUI and Tools. 

The Kubo (go-ipfs) team maintains IPFS implementations like Kubo and empowers others to develop and innovate their own IPFS implementations/applications. 

The GUI & Tools team builds and maintains gui products for both developers and non-developers. They also own some tools, including web tools, and the compliance checker.

fields.Name: Lurk
fields.Short description: Lurk is a Turing-complete programming language for recursive zk-SNARKs. It is a statically scoped dialect of Lisp, influenced by Scheme and Common Lisp.
fields.Long description: Lurk is a Turing-complete programming language for recursive zk-SNARKs (zero knowledge Succinct Non-interactive ARguments of Knowledge) that will enable new possibilities for SNARK proofs, blockchain consensus, the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM), decentralized apps, data integration with IPFS and IPLD, and more.

fields.Name: SharpShark
fields.Short description: Web3 copyright protection service for businesses to protect and monetize their copyrightable content
fields.Long description:
We are SharpShark, a WEB3 copyright protection service that helps businesses to protect & monetize their textual, visual, and other copyrightable content.

75% of digital content is plagiarism — from NFTs on OpenSea to longreads on blog platforms. Content creators & intellectual property owners are losing money — only media businesses lose up to $3B in revenue per year. The current standard of copyright treatment is outdated.

That’s why we’ve created SharpShark. How it works
First, authorship is proved and certified with WEB3 standards that are compatible with modern law both in the US and EU. It’s more cost-efficient and faster than using traditional tools.
Second, SharpShark tracks copyrighted piece usage, be it text or images.
Third, in case of violations, pirated copies are addressed with our blockchain evidence-based dispute resolution tool.
Not only do we protect copyrighted content, but we also help IP holders with monetization by providing a simpler method to buy content with clear terms of usage.

We’re building a decentralized IP oracle. It’s a neutral source of data to allow anyone to know by whom, when & with what terms of distribution any piece of content on the web was ever created. For creators, it means full IP control with transparent rights transfer & advanced image monitoring feature that prevents image hijacking.

fields.Name: CryptoNet
fields.Short description: CryptoNetLab is an applied cryptography research lab working focusing on improving crypto-networks
fields.Long description:
CryptoNet is a community of researchers and engineers working on designing, proving, improving the building blocks for crypto-networks to engender new capabilities across the Web 3.0 stack. 

The group was founded to drive the creation of Filecoin, but it seeks to facilitate the development and incorporation of cryptographic tools to increase security and privacy of communication more broadly.

fields.Name: phas3
fields.Short description: phas3 is an innovation consultancy focused on Web3 technologies.
fields.Long description:
phas3 is a consultancy focused on decentralised innovation. 

Decentralised innovation involves all stakeholders in decision-making. Rather than rely on a central group, it leverages diversity of thought and inspires ownership and change.

Innovation that happens when different technologies converge pushes the boundaries of what is possible. For this to take place collaboration must be: interdisciplinary, rapid, and borderless. Decentralisation enables this to happen at scale.

phas3 is an industry expert in decentralised: science (DeSci), data, and AI – the key enablers of decentralised innovation.

fields.Name: Filta
fields.Short description: Enables users to create, collect, and trade face filter and avatar NFTs.
fields.Long description: Built by veterans from Pixar/Oculus - Filta is where you buy and sell limited-edition face filter NFTs from your favorite independent artists. Wear and share your digital merch anywhere on social media.

fields.Name: Memex.Garden
fields.Short description: Personal & collaborative reader to collect, annotate and discuss websites, PDFs and Youtube videos.
fields.Long description:
On our own we can’t possibly understand the majority of topics we encounter every day so we become misinformed and polarised. 
However, we all search, filter, read and take notes about content online and produce information valuable to other people.

Memex helps you share your reading & research output so that you can build on each others’ research and easily compare contrary idea. 
It's a personal & collaborative reader to collect, annotate and discuss websites, PDFs and Youtube videos. By yourself or with your team and community.

Memex is funded with a novel investor/team reward model with the goal of reducing profit maximisation incentives & ensure long-term alignment with the interests of our users and ecosystem: More about that here: https://links.memex.garden/RegenerativeFunding 

We raised 225k out of our 250k pre-seed round to turn Memex into a collaborative reader for knowledge communities on Discord, Slack and Telegram. https://links.memex.garden/MemexDiscordDemo

fields.Name: Numbers Protocol
fields.Short description: A decentralized photo network for creating community, value and trust in digital media.
fields.Long description: Numbers is a decentralized photo network for creating community, value and trust in digital media. They aim to redefine what authentic means online by putting critical thinking first.

fields.Name: Filmine

fields.Long description: Ensuring IPFS and Filecoin are production-grade solutions for building on the web.

fields.Name: Slik Photos

fields.Name: Lido Finance
fields.Short description: Lido builds state of the art liquid staking protocols to grow the staking economy.
fields.Long description:
Lido builds state of the art liquid staking protocols to grow the staking economy.  

Lido lets users stake their assets for daily staking rewards. User can stake any amount of tokens - no minimum.


When staking Lido you mint staked tokens which are issued 1:1 to your initial stake. Your staked tokens can be used across the DeFi ecosystem.

Lido lets you to use your staked assets as collateral, for lending and more. When using Lido, you receive staking rewards in real-time and also could use staked tokens across the DeFi ecosystem without any lock-ups.

Lido DAO is a community that builds liquid staking services and governs the direction of Lido. The number of DAO participants is growing daily with contributors working together to build the future of Lido.

fields.Name: Syndicate

TimescaleDB is an open-source time-series database that natively supports full-SQL, combining the power, reliability, and ease-of-use of a relational database with the scalability typically seen in NoSQL systems.

Major Venus users are based in Asia while some are in Europe and NA.  Venus core team started programs like Venus meetup and Venus SP Incubator in late 2021. Consumers are slowly realizing that this new way of experiencing video games and digital experiences overall allows them to have more fun, freedom, and opportunities than ever before and so are slowly switching to this new form of engagement that combine the digital with the physical world.

We believe there's a unique opportunity to build a platform that connects football video games with those experiences and, ultimately, bring a better, more rich, productive, and empowering way of entertainment to football fans.

fields.Name: NFT.Storage
fields.Short description: NFT.Storage is a long-term storage service designed for off-chain NFT data (like metadata, images, and other assets) for up to 31GiB in size per individual upload. Data is content addressed using IPFS, meaning the URI pointing to a piece of data (“ipfs://…”) is completely unique to that data (using a content identifier, or CID). IPFS URLs and CIDs can be used in NFTs and metadata to ensure the NFT forever actually refers to the intended data (eliminating things like rug pulls, and making it trustlessly verifiable what content an NFT is associated with).
fields.Long description:
NFT.Storage is a long-term storage service designed for off-chain NFT data (like metadata, images, and other assets) for up to 31GiB in size per individual upload. Data is content addressed using IPFS, meaning the URI pointing to a piece of data (“ipfs://…”) is completely unique to that data (using a content identifier, or CID). IPFS URLs and CIDs can be used in NFTs and metadata to ensure the NFT forever actually refers to the intended data (eliminating things like rug pulls, and making it trustlessly verifiable what content an NFT is associated with).

NFT.Storage stores many copies of uploaded data on the public IPFS network in two primary ways: in dedicated IPFS servers managed by NFT.Storage, and decentralized on Filecoin. Since IPFS is a standard used by many different storage services, it's easy to redundantly store data uploaded to NFT.Storage on any other IPFS-compatible storage solution from pinning services, to your local IPFS node, to other storage networks like Arweave or Storj. And as time goes on, NFT.Storage will increasingly decentralize itself as a public good!

fields.Short description:

fields.Long description:
Sending
> You deposit your money with the Peanut smart contract.
> This smart contract generates a secret link.
> You send the link however you like. Email, telegram, whatsapp, slap onto a billboard. We don't mind. Whoever has the link can claim the funds though, so maybe re-think the billboard thing.

Claiming
> Claiming is extremely easy, you only need to enter an address!
> We'll immediately unlock the funds from the escrow smart contract and send them to you

fields.Name: Nym
fields.Short description: Nym protects privacy at the network layer by encrypting and relaying your internet traffic through a multi-layered network called a mixnet. In each layer of the mixnet, mix nodes mix your internet traffic with that of other users, making communications private and hiding your metadata (IP address, who you talk to, when and where, and more).
fields.Long description:
Nym protects privacy at the network layer by encrypting and relaying your internet traffic through a multi-layered network called a mixnet. In each layer of the mixnet, mix nodes mix your internet traffic with that of other users, making communications private and hiding your metadata (IP address, who you talk to, when and where, and more).

The Nym mixnet is incentivized and decentralized. Users pay a fee in NYM to send their data through the mixnet. By pledging an initial bond of NYM, anyone can run a mix node. Node runners are then rewarded in NYM tokens based on good quality of service, doing the work of mixing packets and providing privacy for the end users. This is called ‘proof of mixing,’ similar to how Bitcoin rewards miners for mining new blocks. The reward mechanism enables the mixnet to scale and decentralize.

Nym can work with any application. From Bitcoin to ZCash, no current “layer 1” blockchain provides “layer 0 privacy” for the peer-to-peer broadcasts used in every transaction. Nym can provide network-level privacy for any blockchain and other generic applications. From Bitcoin to instant messaging, developers can build their applications on top of Nym for network layer and metadata protection of their users.

fields.Name: Midpoint Labs
fields.Short description: Make API calls from smart contracts to any off-chain endpoint without custom nodes or infrastructure
fields.Long description:
Midpoint is a platform that allows developers to easily integrate their smart contracts with off-chain endpoints without running nodes or infrastructure. Developers configure an HTTP request and can specify any part to come from on or off-chain, allowing them to access endpoints that require authentication such as Twitter or endpoints with complex responses such as Google Maps. Midpoint handles the heavy lifting of listening for requests on chain and keeping the connection to off-chain endpoints available. The entire process of sending a text, posting a tweet, or requesting off-chain data has been boiled down to one line of Solidity. 

Today developers are using Midpoint to interface their contracts with hundreds of traditional services including Twilio, Slack, Twitter, Salesforce, PayPal, SendGrid, Discord, DocuSign,  GitHub, Jira, and OpenAI.

With deep expertise in Blockchain, Token Engineering, AI, Data Science, and Operations Research, they provide engineering, design, and analytics services to a wide range of clients including for-profit, non-profit, academic, and government organizations. 


Their R&D occurs in iterative cycles between open-source research and software development, and application of the research and tools to client projects. BlockScience client work includes pre-launch design and post-launch monitoring and maintenance of economic and governance mechanisms based on research, simulation, and analysis. With this unique blend of engineering, data science, and social science expertise, the BlockScience team aims to diagnose and solve today’s most challenging frontier socio-technical problems.

fields.Name: DeSci Foundation
fields.Short description: Scientists exploring the potential of new technologies, processes, and funding models.
fields.Long description:
We support the development of a more verifiable, more open, and fairer ecosystem for science and scientists. The Desci Foundation is an independent organization of leading scientists and innovators. We are dedicated to exploring the potential of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.

Our mission is to support high-quality science by: 
1) Carefully assessing the opportunities and risks of applying new technologies, incentives, processes, and funding models to the scientific ecosystem.
2) Guiding and supporting the development and implementation of new ways to enable high-quality, replicable science. 
3) Bringing scientists & innovators together. 
4) Enfranchising a group of stakeholders to steer the emerging ecosystem of decentralized science, such as that built by DeSci Labs. 

We are particularly passionate about projects that support:
1) Open science practices such as pre-registered analysis plans, open repositories, accessible code, and FAIR data.
2) Replication studies.
3) Open peer review.
4) Fair rewards for the work that scientists are doing.
5) Efficient funding models for research.
