fields.Long description: Brave is a privacy-focused browser, which automatically blocks online advertisements and website trackers in its default settings. It also provides users the choice to turn on optional ads that pay users for their attention in the form of Basic Attention Tokens (BAT) cryptocurrency. Users can then send contributions to websites and content creators, which support BAT in the form of tips along with the ability to keep the cryptocurrency they earned.

fields.Name: Medium
fields.Short description: Medium is an American online publishing platform.

fields.Name: OP Games
fields.Short description: Building a toolbox to help game developers build disruptive games on web and mobile.
fields.Long description: OP is a platform designed for players to discover HTML5 games, compete in tournament competitions, and buy OP NFTs. By using the OP Protocol, developers can start building a sustainable model that replaces web 2.0 platforms.

fields.Name: Fluence Labs
fields.Short description: An open-source, permissionless, decentralized platform and development toolkit for P2P applications.
fields.Long description: Fluence is a decentralized platform designed to enable the freedom of digital innovation via peer-to-peer applications.

fields.Name: Solaris
fields.Short description: Providing event planning for the web3 community.
fields.Long description:
Solaris is a premium events agency, dedicated to delivering
elevated experiences for the Web3 community.

fields.Name: BlastGG
fields.Short description: A dApp allowing gamers to challenge each other & join tournaments in a trustless way to earn money.
fields.Long description: Blast GG is a gaming platform for skill-based bets & challenges, improving your skills playing esports games, and winning prizes. Blast is helping gamers earn money in every game with the power of Blockchain.

fields.Name: DeSci Labs
fields.Short description: Creating a radically transparent ledger of scientific record
fields.Long description:
DeSci Labs is a passionate group of builders who are working to create a radically transparent ledger of scientific record that is reproducible, secure, permanent, interoperable and resistant to cross-national censorship. 

Their first project, Research Nodes, is an interface for interactive research objects living in an open state repositories. These research objects give scientists the ability to store a variety of components including manuscripts, code, data, videos, images and more. These components can be linked together to showcase reproducibility through an imbedded annotation system and in-browser compute functionality on a familiar IDE interface.  The entirety of a Research Node is citeable, from the entire object down to a specific annotation in a past version history.

fields.Name: EFF.org
fields.Short description: Ensuring that technology supports freedom, justice, and innovation for all people of the world.
fields.Long description: The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) is the leading organization defending civil liberties in the digital world. For decades EFF has worked tirelessly in the courts and with activists to protect the freedom to hack, tinker, remix, and create for the long term good of society. EFF defends free speech on the Internet, fights illegal surveillance, supports freedom-enhancing technologies, and much more.  The EFF team consists of a unique blend of activists, technologists, and attorneys that work to ensure that the rights and freedoms we enjoy are enhanced, rather than eroded, as our use of technology grows. Join EFF's movement to protect digital freedom today at eff.org/join.

fields.Name: Protocol Labs
fields.Short description: Driving breakthroughs in computing to push humanity forward.
fields.Long description: Protocol Labs is an open-source research, development, and deployment laboratory. Their projects include IPFS, Filecoin, libp2p, and many more. They aim to make human existence orders of magnitude better through technology. They are a fully distributed company with a team of more than 100 members working remotely and in the open to improve the internet — humanity's most important technology — as they explore new advances in computing and related fields.

fields.Name: Nikas
fields.Short description: A management consulting company assisting clients with their digital transformation needs.
fields.Long description: Nikas is a global technology company focused on software, resources, and consulting for simplification of business processes and management aimed at helping startups in finding, planning, and executing the best monetization, pricing, go-to-market, and business models strategies.

fields.Name: Mint State Labs
fields.Short description: A comic book store brought to the blockchain.
fields.Long description:
Mint State Labs provides NFT minting and grading services for game developers and comic creators.

Transitioned into Orange Comet

fields.Name: Mintter Technologies
fields.Short description: A decentralized knowledge collaboration application powered by a knowledge graph.
fields.Long description: Mintter is a peer to peer collaborative publishing platform. Authors create and distribute content via direct person to person connections without any central servers. It is a new distribution channel that you control without Gatekeepers.

fields.Name: Filecoin Saturn
fields.Short description: Filecoin Saturn is an open-source, community-run Content Delivery Network (CDN) built on Filecoin.
fields.Long description:
Saturn is a Web3 CDN in Filecoin’s retrieval market. On one side of the network, websites buy fast, low-cost content delivery. On the other side, Saturn node operators earn Filecoin by fulfilling requests.

Saturn is trustless, permissionless, and inclusive. Anyone can run Saturn software, contribute to the network, and earn Filecoin.

Content on Saturn is IPFS content-addressed. Every piece of content is immutable and every response verifiable.

fields.Name: Creative Commons
fields.Short description: The nonprofit behind the licenses and tools the world uses to share.
fields.Long description: Creative Commons is a nonprofit organization dedicated to building a globally-accessible public commons of knowledge and culture. They make it easier for people to share creative and academic work, as well as to access and build upon the work of others. By helping people and organizations share knowledge and creativity, Creative Commons aim to build a more equitable, accessible, and innovative world.  In order to achieve our mission, they:  — Provide Creative Commons licenses and public domain tools that give every person and organization in the world a free, simple, and standardized way to grant copyright permissions for creative and academic works; ensure proper attribution; and allow others to copy, distribute, and make use of those works — Work closely with major institutions to ensure the correct use and implementation of CC licenses and CC-licensed content — Support the CC Global Network, a community initiative working to increase the volume, breadth, and quality of openly-available knowledge worldwide — Develop technology like CC Search that makes openly-licensed material easier to discover and use — Offer the Creative Commons Certificate, an in-depth course for people interested in becoming experts in creating and engaging with openly-licensed works — Produce CC Summit, an annual event that brings together an international group of educators, artists, technologists, legal experts, and activists to promote the power of open licensing and global access

fields.Name: JFrog
fields.Short description: JFrog is on a mission to be the company powering all of the world’s software updates, driven by a “Liquid Software” vision to allow the seamless, secure flow of binaries from developers to the edge.
fields.Long description: JFrog is on a mission to be the company powering all of the world’s software updates, driven by a “Liquid Software” vision to allow the seamless, secure flow of binaries from developers to the edge. The company’s end-to-end DevOps platform – the JFrog Platform - provides the tools and visibility required by modern organizations to solve today’s challenges across critical pieces of the DevOps cycle. JFrog is trusted by millions of users and thousands of customers, including a majority of the Fortune 100 companies worldwide. If you are a team player who wants to play to WIN, join our Swamp today.

fields.Name: DataPocket
fields.Short description: Making decentralized storage usable by productizing web2 experiences.
fields.Long description: DataPocket makes decentralized storage usable by productizing web2 experiences.

fields.Name: Glif Infinite Scroll
fields.Short description: Interoperable tools for the Filecoin network.
fields.Long description: Glif is part of the Infinite Scroll and allows anyone to create self-sustaining tools. Current available Glifs, or interoperable tools for the Filecoin Network, include the following: wallet, vault, JavaScript tools to build on Filecoin, nodes and verified storage.

fields.Name: Social3
fields.Short description: A Decentralised "LinkedIn".
fields.Long description: A Decentralised "LinkedIn".  The First Ever Web3 Social Hiring Platform

fields.Name: Portrait
fields.Short description: Portrait is a decentralized drag-and-drop web page builder with cryptographic proofs.
fields.Long description: Portrait is a decentralized drag-and-drop web page builder with cryptographic proofs. It is the first open source solution that bridges the gap between blockchain domains and distributed file systems and protocols. Portrait web pages contain tamper-proof signatures of ownership and edit history.

fields.Name: Starling
fields.Short description: A three module framework for data integrity - capture, store and verify.
fields.Long description: Starling is innovating with the latest cryptographic methods and decentralized web protocols to meet the technical and ethical challenges of establishing trust in the most sensitive digital records, such as the documentation of human rights violations, war crimes and testimony of genocide.

fields.Name: ConvoSpace
fields.Short description: A decentralized conversation protocol that separates social data from applications.
fields.Long description: ConvoSpace enables developers to build composable components for conversation with a simple API that phases out the complexities of Web3. Convo unbundles the conversation layer from the Interface allowing users to own their data irrespective of the interface.

fields.Name: Audius
fields.Short description: A digital streaming service that connects fans directly with artists and exclusive new music.
fields.Long description: Audius is owned and run by an open-source community of artists, fans, and api around the world. Audius gives artists the power to share never-before-heard music and monetize streams directly. With the Audius API, developers can build their own apps on top of Audius, giving them access to unique audio catalogs.

fields.Name: Builder’s Funnel
fields.Short description: Protocol Lab's Builders Funnel team.

fields.Name: DataUnion
fields.Short description: Building Data-Unions-as-a-service to create AI ready data and co-owned insights.
fields.Long description: Building Data-Unions-as-a-service to create AI ready data and co-owned insights. Our alpha: https://t.co/S0mMzkVMUe Community: https://t.co/i1PKrgOLWI

fields.Name: PL Ventures
fields.Short description: Protocol Labs Ventures team.

fields.Name: number zero
fields.Short description: The team behind Iroh, the next generation of IPFS.
fields.Long description: Number zero is a deep-tech company working at the intersection of the decentralized web and cloud computing. They invent novel approaches to hard problems through collaborations with great partners, then refine those solutions into SaaS products. Their team has experience building & shipping decentralized technologies like IPFS & Filecoin.

fields.Name: Openlinks
fields.Short description: Openlinks.io is a link-in-bio app built on IPFS. In a few clicks, launch a link in bio that only you control.
fields.Long description: Openlinks only requires an email & doesn't collect user data... Made for a new age of data privacy & control. Were giving users a better experience while using open-web architecture.

fields.Name: Andsub
fields.Short description: NFT subscriptions for Web3 businesses.
fields.Long description: NFT subscriptions for Web3 businesses. Integrate auto-renewable on-chain subscriptions to your website or community. Let your users pay by ERC20 tokens in multiple networks. Fully on-chain.

fields.Name: Flame
fields.Short description: A decentralized NFT marketplace for creators.
fields.Long description: Flame is a decentralized NFT marketplace for creators.
fields.Notes INTERNAL: NO DETAILS PROVIDED. Reached out to Sijie for introductions and clarity- 6/2022 website and project direction are under

fields.Name: Capyloon
fields.Short description: Capyloon is an experimental user agent that aims to give you what you deserve: privacy and control through freedom from the constraints imposed by OS vendors and service providers who decide what you can or can't do online, and how.

fields.Name: Radix
fields.Short description: An operating system for labs to help scientists do their best work.
fields.Long description: Radix believes that modern labs are capable of more than they are currently doing, so they are building an operating system to help scientists do their best work in complex labs.

fields.Name: Fenbushi Ecosystem Fund
fields.Short description: A venture capital firm in Asia dedicated to building blockchain companies.
fields.Long description: Fenbushi Capital is a blockchain-focused venture capital firm in Asia. Their mission is to drive healthy and sustainable growth in the global blockchain ecosystem, and actively works as a long-term strategic partner to its portfolio projects.

fields.Name: KLOOV
fields.Short description: Web3 music publisher platform with a set of tools to grow and engage fans.
fields.Long description:
KLOOV is a music platform with the mission of converting passive audiences into active communities of backers and investors. We are incorporated as a Music Publisher and can collect, tokenize and distribute music publishing royalties among the token holders. 
Our main focus is to provide different tools and models for the 4 stages of a music work: unreleased, pre-released, released and performing. We do so by using our innovations on a Web2.5 platform that mixes the best of Web2 with the power of Web3. 
We developed a hybrid media protection system, to secure the access to exclusive works. Also our own custodial wallet for easy payments, so users can buy collectibles without the need of going through the hassle of web3, while still giving the option of a full web3 experience. 
Besides we're working on a Distributed DRM protection and storage media system based on IPFS and Filecoin.

fields.Name: Mysterious
fields.Short description: Creating a secure & customizable web3 community platform.
fields.Long description:
Mysterious 
 is creating a crypto-native web3 community platform where creators can chat, mint, and transact. It is safe & customizable so that creators can create a home for their community.

fields.Name: Spruce
fields.Short description: Allowing users to control their data across the web.
fields.Long description: Spruce allows users to control their data across the web. They believe that the world is evolving toward one based on cryptography, networks, and digital economies that are user-controlled and they’re unlocking this transition with their constellation of products.

fields.Name: Filecoin Green
fields.Short description: Making Filecoin sustainable and using Filecoin to make other industries sustainable.
fields.Long description:
Filecoin Green aims to measure the environmental impacts of Filecoin and verifiably drive them below zero, building infrastructure along the way that allows anyone to make transparent and substantive environmental claims. We're working to connect the whole network to renewable energy, allowing each individual Filecoin Storage Provider to publicly prove their source of electricity.

Filecoin Green organizes the Sustainable Blockchain Summit https://sbs.tech/

fields.Name: Gummys
fields.Short description: A community powered streaming platform for all things Web3.
fields.Long description: A community powered streaming platform for all things Web3.  Through Gummys privacy measures, users have peace of mind knowing that they do not need to worry about their data being sold to third parties or a data bridge as they only need a blockchain public address to use the platform.

fields.Name: Web3 Collabs
fields.Short description: Protocol Labs Web3 Collabs team.

fields.Name: Mnemoscene
fields.Short description: Mnemoscene delivers innovative experiences that engage and inspire.
fields.Long description: Mnemoscene delivers innovative experiences that engage and inspire.

fields.Name: IPFS Search
fields.Short description: Open-source search engine for IPFS.
fields.Long description: ipfs-search.com is a Free and Open Source (FOSS) search engine for the Interplanetary Filesystem (IPFS). Our long-term goal is truly distributed search, by users, for users. Only by aligning platforms’ interests with user interests can technology help foster a free and democratic society.

fields.Name: Video
fields.Short description: The video team for Protocol Labs.
fields.Long description: The video team for Protocol Labs.

fields.Name: FFDW
fields.Short description: A non-profit stewarding the development of open-source software and open protocols.
fields.Long description: Filecoin Foundation for the Decentralized Web (FFDW) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit whose mission is to ensure the permanent preservation of humanity's most important information by stewarding the development of open-source software and open protocols for decentralized data storage and retrieval networks.

fields.Name: Fractio
fields.Short description: Connecting NFT's to real world data one oracle at a time.
fields.Long description: Fractio is the toolkit for digital creators to connect real world data and digital assets without the need for code.

fields.Name: Stellar Development Foundation
fields.Short description: Stellar is network for innovators building real world blockchain solutions that create financial access for everyone.
fields.Long description:
The Stellar Development Foundation is a nonprofit organization based in San Francisco. They are building a common financial platform, designed to be open and accessible to everyone.
 
 Just as the internet allowed anyone to send an email or create a blog, Stellar now allows people to easily send, save, and receive money, without large fees or hassle.

fields.Name: Encultured AI
fields.Short description: A video game company focused on enabling the safe intro of AI tech into their game world.
fields.Long description: A video game company focused on enabling the safe intro of AI tech into their game world.

fields.Name: Near
fields.Short description: The NEAR protocol is a sharded, proof-of-stake, layer-one blockchain that is simple to use, secure and scalable.
fields.Long description: The NEAR protocol is a sharded, proof-of-stake, layer-one blockchain that is simple to use, secure and scalable.

fields.Name: Ethglobal
fields.Short description: Hosting hackathons and summits that support Ehtereum developers and entrepreneurs.
fields.Long description: ETHGlobal aims to foster a world-class ecosystem of Ethereum developers and entrepreneurs by hosting hackathons and summits that support them.

fields.Name: VoiceGems
fields.Short description: The VOICE GEMS project generates unique digital gemstones from voices.
fields.Long description: The VOICE GEMS project generates unique digital gemstones from voices. Each vocal recording is sent through the Voice Gems system of 200,000 particles, which are sculpted by assigned features such as volume, pitch and harmonics found in the data of each voice.

fields.Name: Concept Art House
fields.Short description: Concept Art House is a leading art services provider.
fields.Long description: Concept Labs (formerly Concept Art House) powers Web3 projects for the biggest brands and IP in the world. Since 2007, we've provided art and support for many of the top gaming and entertainment companies in the world and has shipped over 1000 games and collectibles with the world’s most influential brands. With those deep roots in gaming, including franchises such as ROBLOX and Fortnite, Concept Labs has evolved to focus solely on NFTs and has successfully pivoted to play a major role in the creation of Web3 and the metaverse ecosystem.

fields.Name: Afterparty
fields.Short description: A membership-based community where innovative artists, creators, and builders meet.
fields.Long description: Afterparty is a community of innovative minds bonded together by new art and music experiences. They believe in a world where artists and creators have complete control over their fan relationships.
